cause.description:
Education is the best investment any society can make in it's future and itself. It is vital that we educate anyone who is on the verge of becoming, or already a parent on child-rearing, etc. There are plenty of available incentives for this type of thing, including, but not limited to tax breaks.
1. Education is the key to success.
2. Every child is entitled to the best chance that society can give.
cause.mission: Ensure that all parents are educated to a degree that benifits all society.
cause.name: Parental Education
